EmailTemplate.name: patents@lz.com - auto reply
EmailTemplate.subject: patents@lz.com - auto reply
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Your email has been received by our Intellectual Property processing department, Patent division. We will review it within one business day, and will contact you should we have any questions about the information you've provided.
To view the detailed description of the process for obtaining a patent, please Click Here: https://www.legalzoom.com/trademarks-patents-copyrights/patent-overview.html
If you wish to contact our Customer Support Specialists, please Click Here: www.legalzoom.com/questions.html
Thank you for choosing LegalZoom, America's #1 legal document service.
This is a service email related to your LegalZoom account. For more information about how LegalZoom uses your information, please see the Privacy Policy: http://www.legalzoom.com/privacy-policy-popup.html
LegalZoom provides access to independent attorneys and self-help services at your specific direction. We are not a law firm or a substitute for an attorney or law firm. Prices, features, terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. LegalZoom is located at 9900 Spectrum Drive, Austin, TX 78717.
Please add services@emails.legalzoom.com to your address book.
This email was sent to: {!Contact.Email}
